channel.title: AMD Podcast
channel.description: It's been more than 10 years since their last live + vinyl DJ set, but Fusion 9 (Wildcrush and Sholt) is back, and back with a new mix series. Analogue Meets Digital is a bi-weekly podcast, bringing you their latest raw, industrial techno sets and one guest mix every second Monday.
channel.itunes:summary: Hosted by Fusion 9, Analogue Meets Digital is a bi-weekly podcast, bringing you the hosts' latest raw, industrial techno sets and one guest mix every second Monday.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Analogue Meets Digital Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Analogue Meets Digital

item.title: AMD 001.B - Sholt
item.itunes:author: Analogue Meets Digital
item.itunes:subtitle: Today's host is Sholt with a noisy dark techno set
item.itunes:summary: This is the second hour of our first episode. Today's host is Sholt and we do hope you'll love his noisy dark techno set.
item.description: This is the second hour of our first episode. Today's host is Sholt and we do hope you'll love his noisy dark techno set.

item.title: AMD 001.A - Subcone
item.itunes:author: Analogue Meets Digital
item.itunes:subtitle: We are pleased to have Subcone behind the decks
item.itunes:summary: We are pleased to have Subcone behind the decks with a lovely selection of underground techno records. This is the first hour of our first episode, enjoy!
item.description: We are pleased to have Subcone behind the decks with a lovely selection of underground techno records. This is the first hour of our first episode, enjoy!

item.title: AMD 000 - Fusion 9 - Live @ BeatRoom
item.itunes:author: Analogue Meets Digital
item.itunes:subtitle: The very first episode, featuring our hybrid DJ+live set recorded live on New Year's Eve.
item.itunes:summary: The very first episode of our bi-weekly podcast, "Analogue Meets Digital". It's a special one, as there is no guest today and you can listen to our hybrid DJ+live set recorded live on New Year's Eve.
item.description: The very first episode of our bi-weekly podcast, "Analogue Meets Digital". It's a special one, as there is no guest today and you can listen to our hybrid DJ+live set recorded live on New Year's Eve.
